response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit your endeavors. The product is valued at $1,200,000 to me, and considering its immense worth to you, I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $1,080,000. This exclusive opportunity is tailored to ensure you receive exceptional value while also maximizing my earnings. I look forward to your positive response and the possibility of a successful transaction. Kind regards, Alice.", "product_price": 1080000}
